name: BOUNCE (itch) (Luka_)
description:
BOUNCE around through an endlessly chaotic game!

Move towards and hit the blue target to increase your score but also add a fast-moving projectile in the process. 

Use pink projectiles to delete projectiles around you 

Use light blue projectiles to freeze all other projectiles in the game

Watch out for red projectiles!

Increasing your score advances you to the next stage (hint: get a score of at least 20)
